languages.text: "Каллигос — изменник! Пока Простор пылает, раздираемый еретиками и богомерзкими ксеносами, Винтерскейл окончательно забыл свой долг и посмел проигнорировать призыв Лорд-инквизитора на битву. Мои слуги захватывают его миры и корабли, пока он прячется и удовлетворяет свои низменные наклонности. Скоро и он предстанет перед судом".

"Winterscale is a traitor! While the Expanse burns, ravaged by heretics and unhallowed xenos, he abandoned his duty completely and had the nerve to ignore the Lord Inquisitor's call to battle. My servants are capturing his worlds and ships while he hides from his reckoning, indulging his base urges. Soon enough, he too will stand before judgement."
languages.original_text: "Каллигос — изменник! Пока Простор пылает, раздираемый еретиками и богомерзкими ксеносами, Винтерскейл окончательно забыл свой долг и посмел проигнорировать призыв Лорд-инквизитора на битву. Мои слуги захватывают его миры и корабли, пока он прячется и удовлетворяет свои низменные наклонности. Скоро и он предстанет перед судом".

My servants are taking over his worlds and ships while he is hiding from reckoning and indulging his base urges. Soon enough, he too will stand before judgement."

languages.text: “温特斯凯尔是个叛徒！当科罗努斯扩区熊熊燃烧，惨遭异端分子与异形蹂躏时，他却完全放弃了他的职责，而且竟敢无视大审判官的战斗号召。我的仆人正在不断占领他的世界与舰船，和他却依然在放纵自己的欲望，躲避这场清算。用不了多久，他也会接受审判。”
languages.original_text: "Winterscale is a traitor! While the Expanse burns, ravaged by heretics and unhallowed xenos, he abandoned his duty completely and had the nerve to ignore the Lord Inquisitor's call to battle. My servants are capturing his worlds and ships while he hides from his reckoning, indulging his base urges. Soon enough, he too will stand before judgement."

traits.locale_text: “温特斯凯尔是个叛徒！当科罗努斯扩区熊熊燃烧，惨遭异教徒与异形蹂躏时，他却完全放弃了他的职责，而且竟敢无视审判长的战斗号召。我的仆人正在不断占领他的世界与舰船，和他却依然在放纵自己的欲望，躲避这场清算。用不了多久，他也会接受审判。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「ウィンタースケールは裏切者だ！エクスパンスが異端者や不信心な異種族に荒らされ、燃えている時、あいつは任務を放棄し、ロード・インクィジターの戦への出動命令まで無視をしたんだ。奴が己を省みず、卑しい衝動にふけって隠れている間に、私の召使たちは奴の惑星や船を乗っ取っている。いずれ、奴も裁かれる時が来るだろう」
languages.original_text: "Winterscale is a traitor! While the Expanse burns, ravaged by heretics and unhallowed xenos, he abandoned his duty completely and had the nerve to ignore the Lord Inquisitor's call to battle. My servants are capturing his worlds and ships while he hides from his reckoning, indulging his base urges. Soon enough, he too will stand before judgement."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィンタースケールは裏切者だ！エクスパンスが異端者や不信心な異種族に荒らされ、燃えている時、あいつは任務を放棄し、ロード・インクィジターの戦への出動命令まで無視をしたんだ。奴が己を省みず、卑しい衝動にふけって隠れている間に、私の召使たちは奴の惑星や船を乗っ取っている。いずれ、奴も裁かれる時が来るだろう」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «¡Winterscale es un traidor! Mientras la Extensión arde, asolada por herejes y xenos, él abandona por completo su deber y encima tiene el descaro de ignorar la llamada a batalla del Lord Inquisidor. Mis sirvientes se están apoderando de sus mundos y sus naves mientras él se esconde para no rendir cuentas y satisface sus impulsos. Pronto será juzgado».
languages.original_text: "Winterscale is a traitor! While the Expanse burns, ravaged by heretics and unhallowed xenos, he abandoned his duty completely and had the nerve to ignore the Lord Inquisitor's call to battle. My servants are capturing his worlds and ships while he hides from his reckoning, indulging his base urges. Soon enough, he too will stand before judgement."

traits.locale_text: «¡Winterscale es un traidor! Mientras la Extensión arde, asolada por herejes y xenos, él abandona por completo su deber y encima tiene el descaro de ignorar la llamada a batalla del Lord Inquisidor. Mis sirvientes se están apoderando de sus mundos y sus naves mientras él se esconde para no rendir cuentas y satisface sus impulsos. Pronto será juzgado».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Winterzunder ist ein Verräter! Während die Ausdehnung brennt, von Ketzern und unheiligen Xenos verwüstet, vernachlässigt er dreist seine Pflicht. Der Großinquisitor hat alle zu den Waffen gerufen, doch Winterzunder ignoriert den Ruf. Meine Diener übernehmen seine Welten und Schiffe, während er sich vor seiner gerechten Strafe versteckt und seinen niedersten Trieben nachgeht. Schon bald wird er auch vor Gericht stehen."
languages.original_text: "Winterscale is a traitor! While the Expanse burns, ravaged by heretics and unhallowed xenos, he abandoned his duty completely and had the nerve to ignore the Lord Inquisitor's call to battle. My servants are capturing his worlds and ships while he hides from his reckoning, indulging his base urges. Soon enough, he too will stand before judgement."

traits.locale_text: "Winterzunder ist ein Verräter! Während die Ausdehnung brennt, von Ketzern und unheiligen Xenos verwüstet, vernachlässigt er dreist seine Pflicht. Der Großinquisitor hat alle zu den Waffen gerufen, doch Winterzunder ignoriert den Ruf. Meine Diener übernehmen seine Welten und Schiffe, während er sich vor seiner gerechten Strafe versteckt und seinen niedersten Trieben nachgeht. Schon bald wird er auch vor Gericht stehen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Winterscale est un traître ! Pendant que les Étendues brûlent, ravagées par les hérétiques et les xénos impies, il a abandonné son devoir et osé ignorer l'appel au combat du seigneur inquisiteur. Mes serviteurs s'emparent de ses mondes et de ses vaisseaux pendant qu'il se terre pour échapper à son châtiment et laisser libre cours à ses instincts les plus primitifs. Bientôt, il subira lui aussi le jugement de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Winterscale is a traitor! While the Expanse burns, ravaged by heretics and unhallowed xenos, he abandoned his duty completely and had the nerve to ignore the Lord Inquisitor's call to battle. My servants are capturing his worlds and ships while he hides from his reckoning, indulging his base urges. Soon enough, he too will stand before judgement."

traits.locale_text: « Winterscale est un traître ! Pendant que les Étendues brûlent, ravagées par les hérétiques et les xénos impies, il a abandonné son devoir et osé ignorer l'appel au combat du seigneur inquisiteur. Mes serviteurs sont en train de s'emparer de ses mondes et de ses vaisseaux pendant qu'il se terre pour échapper à son châtiment et laisser libre cours à ses instincts les plus primitifs. Bientôt, il subira lui aussi le jugement de l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Winterscale haindir! Enginlik yanarken, kâfirlerce ve varlıkları dine hakaret olan zenolarca talan edilirken vazifesini tamamen bir kenara bıraktı ve Lord Engizisyoncu'nun savaş çağrısını yok sayma cüreti gösterdi. O hak ettiği cezadan kaçarken ve ilkel dürtülerini tatmin etmeye çalışırken hizmetkârlarım, onun dünyalarını ve gemilerini ele geçiriyor. Yakında o da adaletin karşısına çıkacak."
languages.original_text: "Winterscale is a traitor! While the Expanse burns, ravaged by heretics and unhallowed xenos, he abandoned his duty completely and had the nerve to ignore the Lord Inquisitor's call to battle. My servants are capturing his worlds and ships while he hides from his reckoning, indulging his base urges. Soon enough, he too will stand before judgement."

traits.locale_text: "Winterscale bir hain! Enginlik yanarken, kâfirlerce ve varlıkları dine hakaret olan zenolarca talan edilirken, vazifesini tamamen bir kenara bıraktı ve Lord Engizisyoncu'nun savaşa çağrısını yok sayma cüreti gösterdi. O, hak ettiği cezadan kaçarken ve ilkel dürtülerini tatmin etmeye çalışırken, hizmetkârlarım onun dünyalarını ve gemilerini ele geçiriyor. Yakında o da adaletin karşısına çıkacaktır."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
